Projects

Source: vignettes/projects.Rmd
projects.Rmd
library(kwb.site)

Tables

# Get project infos from KWB website
project_infos <- get_projects(debug = FALSE)
jsonlite::write_json(project_infos, "projects.json")
plot_project_gant_chart(projects_json = "projects.json", 
                        tag_selection = "department", 
                        interactive = TRUE, 
                        interactive_export = TRUE)
#> Warning: 38 failed to parse.
#> Joining, by = "id"
#> Joining, by = "tags"
plot_project_gant_chart(projects_json = "projects.json", 
                        tag_selection = "topics", 
                        interactive = TRUE, 
                        interactive_export = TRUE)
#> Warning: 38 failed to parse.
#> Joining, by = "id"
#> Joining, by = "tags"

We have in total 152 project websites in German and English on the KWB website.

English

project_infos_en <- project_infos %>%
  dplyr::filter(language == "en") 

jsonlite::write_json(project_infos_en , "projects_en.json")

DT::datatable(project_infos_en[,-3])

For 71 projects the information is available in English.

German

project_infos_de <- project_infos %>%
  dplyr::filter(language == "de") 

jsonlite::write_json(project_infos_de, "projects_de.json")

DT::datatable(project_infos_de[,-3])

For 81 projects the information is available in German.

Plots

English

By Department

plot_project_gant_chart(projects_json ="projects.json")
#> Warning: 38 failed to parse.
#> Joining, by = "id"
#> Joining, by = "tags"

By Topic

plot_project_gant_chart(projects_json = "projects.json", tag_selection = "topic")
#> Warning: 38 failed to parse.
#> Joining, by = "id"
#> Joining, by = "tags"

German

By Department

plot_project_gant_chart(projects_json ="projects.json",language_selection = "de")
#> Warning: 38 failed to parse.
#> Joining, by = "id"
#> Joining, by = "tags"
#> Warning: Removed 38 rows containing missing values (geom_segment).

By Topic

plot_project_gant_chart(projects_json ="projects.json",
                        tag_selection = "topic",
                        language_selection = "de")

``
